message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a starting price of $18,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. That price is a bit high for me, would you consider $8,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I understand your offer, the value of this product is considerably higher. I could come down to $15,000, which I think is a fair price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  I'm willing to go up to $10,000, but that's my limit.
